name: WASD
description:
Overview:

As a challenge, I decided to try and base a game around a new, central mechanic. The result is WASD, where, by some exotic magic, spike and arrow traps are triggered by keyboard presses. Sure, it's pretty easy, until you jump and the spike trap you forgot about is suddenly triggered.

Features:

  • Death
  • Spikes
  • Fun

Controls:

[WASD] - Move

A Game a Week [Week 9]:

This game is my ninth game for "a game a week". Every week, I will force myself to make and release a (terrible) game. It's like a ransom, except games instead of hostages...probably. You can follow my progress on twitter (@enathang) or on my website (pixelmancer.io). Stay tuned!
